cards.title: Climbing the Ladder!
cards.centerfold: Congratulations on your promotion! Now you can finally afford to buy all the fancy coffee you’ll need to survive the extra responsibilities. Just remember – with great power comes great coffee breaks!
cards.artistInspiration: vibrant neo-expressionist style with ornate floral backgrounds and bold color fields

cards.title: Cheers to Your Success!
cards.centerfold: Your hard work and dedication have truly paid off, and this promotion is a testament to your incredible talents. May this next chapter be filled with joy, growth, and endless opportunities. You deserve every ounce of this success and more!
cards.artistInspiration: contemporary Japanese superflat pop art with repeating colorful patterns and playful motifs

cards.title: Cheers to Your Success!
cards.centerfold: Congratulations on your well-deserved promotion! Your hard work and determination have truly paid off, and this is just the beginning of even greater things to come. Keep shining and inspiring those around you!
cards.back: With warmest wishes for your bright future!
cards.artistInspiration: immersive polka-dot infinity style with mesmerizing repeating circles and vivid colors
